This PR adds a stored procedure for removing orphan files.

timeline.bodyText:
I usually think a ternary expression is easier to read in situations like this, rather than trying to think about negating isNullAt:
boolean dryRun = args.isNullAt(4) ? false : args.getBoolean(4);
timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: I wrote that and Intellij suggested to simplify it :) I agree it is more obvious with the ternary expression, I'll change back.
replies.author: aokolnychyi
